# addInput(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a capture input to the session.

## Declaration

```swift
func addInput(_ input: AVCaptureInput)
```

## Parameters

- **input**: An input to add to the session.

## Discussion

It’s only valid to call this method if [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/canAddInput(_:)] returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

You can invoke this method while the session is running.

## Configuring inputs

- **inputs**: The inputs that provide media data to a capture session.
- **canAddInput(_:)**: Determines whether you can add an input to a session.
- **removeInput(_:)**: Removes an input from the session.
